intro: Willdenowa, commonly known as the willdenowia, is a flowering plant species native to South America. It belongs to the family Malvaceae, which includes hibiscus and cotton. The plant is characterized by its showy, trumpet-shaped flowers that range in color from white to pink. Willdenowia typically grows in moist, shaded environments, such as forest understories. Its leaves are palmately lobed, and it produces capsule fruits that contain numerous small seeds.
